channel.title: Need Some help 317
channel.description:
how do i make it were You click Tinder Box and Then click wood and then wood goes away and you get xp
i click tinder box and wood and nothing happens
How do i make it were you can mine get xp and gold?

item.title: Need Some help 317
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

You can use item on item for the tinderbox and wood. There was a tutorial I think about adding full mining somewhere.
